title: Does the world needs any more mathematicians? If so, why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes.  We still need to finish the Langlands program.  After that there will still be all sorts of tough questions for small primes.   Here is a much more mature point of view on the matter: http://www6.cityu.edu.hk/ma/doc/people/smales/pap104.pdf
